overview: Slayed is strutting up to show you who's boss. This series is devoted to women taking control of their sexuality and shedding all inhibition. Featured cover girls Violet Myers and Vicki Chase share a complicated office power dynamic that goes way beyond the bounds of what HR finds appropriate. Alina Lopez and Allie Nicole, Gianna Dior and Sky Bri, and Vic Marie and Lilly Bell are all ready to take over the upper echelons of eroticism.
title: Boss
